system.Text:
When **you swear upon iron to complete a quest**, write your vow and give the quest a rank. Then, roll +heart. If you make this vow to a person or community with whom you share a bond, add +1.

On a **strong hit**, you are emboldened and it is clear what you must do next (@Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure). Take +2 momentum.

On a **weak hit**, you are determined but begin your quest with more questions than answers. Take +1 momentum, and envision what you do to find a path forward.

On a **miss**, you face a significant obstacle before you can begin your quest. Envision what stands in your way (@Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure), and choose one.

  * You press on: Suffer -2 momentum, and do what you must to overcome this obstacle.
  * You give up: @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.f968f5e0a837a83a]{Forsake Your Vow}.
